entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
